mapper.select: SELECT GROUP_NO,GROUP_NAME,GROUP_MSG,GROUP_PICTURE,GROUP_ADDRESS,GROUP_GRADE_CODE,GROUP_STATE_CODE,MAX_MEMBER,ENROLL_DATE,INTEREST_BIG_CODE,ALLOW_SIGNUP,MIN_AGE,MAX_AGE,GROUP_GENDER,OPEN_SETTING, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM GROUP_MEMBER WHERE GROUP_NO = G.GROUP_NO) MEM_NUM , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM POST WHERE GROUP_NO = G.GROUP_NO) G_POST_COUNT, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM POST_REPLY WHERE GROUP_NO = G.GROUP_NO) G_REPLY_COUNT, (SELECT MEMBER_EMAIL FROM MEMBER M JOIN GROUP_MEMBER GM USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE GM.MEMBER_GRADE_CODE =3 AND GROUP_NO=#{id}) MASTER_EMAIL FROM GROUPS G WHERE GROUP_NO=#{id}
SELECT GROUP_GRADE_NAME, NVL(COUNT(GROUP_MSG), 0) GRADE_COUNT FROM GROUPS RIGHT JOIN GROUP_GRADE USING(GROUP_GRADE_CODE) GROUP BY GROUP_GRADE_NAME ORDER BY GRADE_COUNT DESC
SELECT INTEREST_BIG_NAME, NVL(COUNT(GROUP_MSG), 0) GINTEREST FROM GROUPS RIGHT JOIN INTEREST_BIG USING(interest_big_code) GROUP BY INTEREST_BIG_NAME ORDER BY GINTEREST DESC
SELECT GROUP_STATE_NAME, NVL(COUNT(GROUP_MSG), 0) GRADE_COUNT FROM GROUPS RIGHT JOIN GROUP_STATE USING(GROUP_STATE_CODE) GROUP BY GROUP_STATE_NAME ORDER BY GRADE_COUNT DESC

SELECT filter.enroll_d, count(GROUP_NAME) count_wg FROM (SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE - (LEVEL - 1), 'YY/MM/DD') as enroll_d FROM dual CONNECT BY LEVEL <= 7 ) filter left JOIN groups ON TO_CHAR(groups.ENROLL_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD') = filter.enroll_d group by filter.enroll_d order by enroll_d
SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) from GROUPS) TOTAL, (SELECT COUNT(*) TODAY FROM GROUPS WHERE TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YY/MM/DD')) TODAY FROM DUAL

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, PAGING.* FROM (SELECT SUBSTR(enroll_date, 1, 5) ENROLL_M, COUNT(*) GR_COUNT FROM GROUPS GROUP BY SUBSTR(enroll_date, 1, 5) order by SUBSTR(enroll_date, 1, 5) desc) paging) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 5 order by ENROLL_M

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, PAGING.* FROM( select GROUP_NO, GROUP_NAME, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM POST WHERE GROUP_NO = G.GROUP_NO AND SUBSTR(SUBMIT_DATE,1,5) = SUBSTR(SYSDATE,1,5) ) G_POST_COUNT from groups g order by G_POST_COUNT DESC) paging) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 5
